TEAM

Meet the developers
behind this very site.

Aman

Aman Sreejesh is a motivated 10th-grade student at Innovation Academy with a strong interest in computer science and emerging technologies. He is eager to explore the ways that technology can solve real-world problems, whether through personal projects, hackathons, or hands-on experimentation with programming and AI. Beyond the classroom, Aman has worked on projects ranging from data-driven web apps to creative AI tools, showcasing his curiosity and willingness to learn new skills. His passion for technology is matched by his drive to push himself academically and take on challenges that expand both his knowledge and creativity.

Aman chose to take Foundations of AI because he sees artificial intelligence as one of the most impactful fields shaping the future. By learning the fundamentals, he hopes to build a strong base for developing innovative applications that combine AI with his broader interest in computer science. For him, the class is not just about understanding algorithms, but about gaining the tools to design practical, unique, and meaningful projects that can make a difference in people’s lives. With this foundation, Aman aims to continue exploring AI as a pathway toward future studies and a career at the intersection of technology and innovation.

Viraj

Viraj Das is a dedicated and innovative 10th-grade student at Innovation Academy with a passion for harnessing the power of technology to shape the future. His expertise lies in creating immersive Virtual Reality experiences, where he excels at transforming complex concepts into interactive and engaging digital environments. Beyond the classroom, Viraj runs his YouTube channel, Techno V, where he shares his knowledge and enthusiasm for Artificial Intelligence and Virtual Reality, inspiring others to explore the limitless possibilities of emerging technologies. He is also deeply committed to promoting the integration of VR into education, believing in its potential to revolutionize how students learn. By blending technology with creativity, Viraj envisions a future where students can participate in immersive simulations, experiment with real-world scenarios, and strengthen their critical thinking skills in more engaging and impactful ways.

Viraj chose to take Foundations of AI because he recognizes artificial intelligence as a driving force behind the next wave of innovation. While he has already explored VR and AI in creative projects, he wanted to gain a deeper understanding of the core principles that power AI—how systems learn, adapt, and make decisions. This course gives him the foundation to connect his VR expertise with AI, opening the door to developing intelligent, immersive environments that can respond dynamically to users. For Viraj, learning AI is not just about keeping pace with technology trends; it is about building the knowledge and skills to innovate responsibly, create meaningful educational tools, and contribute to shaping a future where technology truly empowers human potential.
